line_1: Oh slave! with pow'rs thou didst not dare exert,
line_2: Verse cannot stoop so low as thy desert,

line_1: That Courage does it self exert;
line_2: Now if 'tis chiefly in the Heart,

line_1: Like the extensive Soul it does exert;
line_2: Sparkles in every Thought, flames at my Heart,

line_1: Like the extensive Soul it does exert;
line_2: 'Tis all in all, and all in every part.
O'er those who waste or who pervert.

line_1: Meantime as they their manly power exert,
line_2: "God speed ye well!" bursts from each kindly heart.
